findings.title: weak-prng
findings.description: VulnerableStakingContract.claimRewards() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#99-110) uses a weak PRNG: "randomNumber = uint256(blockhash(uint256)(block.number - 1)) % 100 (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#101)"

findings.title: reentrancy-eth
findings.description:
Reentrancy in VulnerableStakingContract.withdrawRewards() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#115-126):
	External calls:
	- (success,None) = msg.sender.call{value: reward}() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#120)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#123)
	VulnerableStakingContract.rewards (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#19) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- VulnerableStakingContract.claimRewards() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#99-110)
	- VulnerableStakingContract.distributeRewards() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#155-162)
	- VulnerableStakingContract.rewards (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#19)
	- VulnerableStakingContract.withdrawRewards() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#115-126)

findings.title: reentrancy-eth
findings.description:
Reentrancy in VulnerableStakingContract.withdraw(uint256) (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#81-94):
	External calls:
	- (success,None) = msg.sender.call{value: _amount}() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#86)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _amount (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#90)
	VulnerableStakingContract.balances (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#18) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- VulnerableStakingContract.balances (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#18)
	- VulnerableStakingContract.claimRewards() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#99-110)
	- VulnerableStakingContract.distributeRewards() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#155-162)
	- VulnerableStakingContract.receive() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#183-188)
	- VulnerableStakingContract.stake(uint256) (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#63-75)
	- VulnerableStakingContract.withdraw(uint256) (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#81-94)

findings.title: tx-origin
findings.description: VulnerableStakingContract.transferOwnership(address) (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#138-142) uses tx.origin for authorization: require(bool,string)(tx.origin == owner,Not authorized) (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#140)

findings.title: missing-zero-check
findings.description:
VulnerableStakingContract.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#138) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#141)

findings.title: reentrancy-benign
findings.description:
Reentrancy in VulnerableStakingContract.withdraw(uint256) (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#81-94):
	External calls:
	- (success,None) = msg.sender.call{value: _amount}() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#86)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalStaked -= _amount (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#91)

findings.title: reentrancy-events
findings.description:
Reentrancy in VulnerableStakingContract.withdrawRewards() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#115-126):
	External calls:
	- (success,None) = msg.sender.call{value: reward}() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#120)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- RewardPaid(msg.sender,reward) (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#125)

findings.title: reentrancy-events
findings.description:
Reentrancy in VulnerableStakingContract.withdraw(uint256) (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#81-94):
	External calls:
	- (success,None) = msg.sender.call{value: _amount}() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#86)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Withdrawn(msg.sender,_amount) (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#93)

findings.title: timestamp
findings.description:
VulnerableStakingContract.withdraw(uint256) (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#81-94) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= lockTime[msg.sender],Tokens locked) (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#83)

findings.title: solc-version
findings.description:
Version constraint ^0.8.0 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- FullInlinerNonExpressionSplitArgumentEvaluationOrder
	- MissingSideEffectsOnSelectorAccess
	- AbiReencodingHeadOverflowWithStaticArrayCleanup
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- DataLocationChangeInInternalOverride
	- NestedCalldataArrayAbiReencodingSizeValidation
	- SignedImmutables
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching.
It is used by:
	- ^0.8.0 (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#8)

findings.title: low-level-calls
findings.description:
Low level call in VulnerableStakingContract.withdraw(uint256) (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#81-94):
	- (success,None) = msg.sender.call{value: _amount}() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#86)

findings.title: low-level-calls
findings.description:
Low level call in VulnerableStakingContract.withdrawRewards() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#115-126):
	- (success,None) = msg.sender.call{value: reward}() (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#120)

findings.title: naming-convention
findings.description: Parameter VulnerableStakingContract.stake(uint256)._amount (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#63) is not in mixedCase

findings.title: naming-convention
findings.description: Variable VulnerableStakingContract.REWARD_RATE (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#24) is not in mixedCase

findings.title: naming-convention
findings.description: Parameter VulnerableStakingContract.withdraw(uint256)._amount (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#81) is not in mixedCase

findings.title: unused-state
findings.description: VulnerableStakingContract.MAX_UINT (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#26) is never used in VulnerableStakingContract (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#15-189)

findings.title: cache-array-length
findings.description: Loop condition i < stakeholders.length (flattened/VulnerableDS.sol#157) should use cached array length instead of referencing `length` member of the storage array.

findings.title: Multiple Storage Reads
findings.description: Multiple storage reads detected. Consider caching in memory variable.

location.code: require(msg.sender == owner, "Not owner"); // Access control issue :cite[1]:cite[4]

findings.recommendation: Store frequently accessed storage values in memory variables.

findings.title: Potential Underflow
findings.description: Subtraction without overflow check detected.
findings.recommendation: Add SafeMath library or require() checks before subtraction.

findings.title: Potential Underflow
findings.description: Subtraction without overflow check detected.
findings.recommendation: Add SafeMath library or require() checks before subtraction.

findings.title: Storage Operation in Loop
findings.description: Storage operations in loops consume high gas. Consider using memory or optimizing loop structure.
findings.recommendation: Cache storage reads in memory variables or restructure the loop.
